thread.title: KTM To Organize a Special day For Owners of Duke/RC 390 on October 25
thread.title_full: KTM To Organize a Special day For Owners of Duke/RC 390 on October 25

title: KTM To Organize a Special day For Owners of Duke/RC 390 on October 25
text:
KTM To Organize a Special day For Owners of Duke/RC 390 on October 25 8th, Oct 2015 3:35 PM View: 324 (1 rate) 
KTM is going to give a surprise to its Duke 390 and RC 390 owners as the Austrian bike maker is gearing up to organize a Track day at Buddh International Circuit on 25th October , 2015. Interested persons can register to participate in this event by reaching their nearest KTM showroom. The company has already organized two Track day since last two years. Moreover, both the motorcycle-Duke 390 and RC 390 attract the attention of lots of Indian enthusiasts. 
See Also: KTM 1290 SM-T Spied While Trials 
Apart from this, The Austrian manufacturer will arrange the national level racing trainer who will train these customers and help them to improve their riding skills on the racing track. In addition, the company will also provide lap timing equipment for the riders by which they can see their lap times. A necessary point is that all riders who will participate in this racing event, need to wear racing accessories including full leather riding suit with armor, riding boots, armored riding gloves and FIA approved full-faced helmet not approved by ISI. 
Related: KTM Officially Releases Photos of 1290 Super Duke GT 
The company will avail few riding suits for those riders who don't have their own at the venue. Riding suit and boot will be made available according to their chest and boot sizes. However, the KTM will not provide a helmet and gloves, therefore the participants will have to carry their own. In addition, the valid driving license, personal insurance, vehicle insurance and vehicle registration certificate will be also carried during participate in the event. There are limited seats and first come first serve basis registration will take place. The registration fee is Rs 1000/- .
